page.title: 03OLD FOLK IN LILLINGTON
page.content: Lillington is a suburb of Leamington. Lillington is N.E. of the centre of Leamington.The landscape is flat but part of Lillington borders the Campion Hills.There are no large shops,just a square of shops,which includes a Post Office and a laundry.There aren't many other shops just the odd ones around the main roads,there are three churches but most of Lillington is houses.Like Leamington, Lillington has some large houses which were once very grand.Many of these have been turned into homes for old people but it can cost a lot to live in some of them. There are also some sheltered housing schemes where old people can live in homes of their own, but with a warden nearby to help if needed. They also have a hall where they can eat, play cards or meet friends.
